definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
tokay gecko (Gekko gecko), used in TCM

sentences.english: Control of root mealy bugs is accomplished with soil drenches with an insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 根部粉蚧的控制是在土壤喷洒杀虫剂时完成的。

sentences.english: Three experimental population life tables of citrus black scale Par-latoria zizyphus Lucas under different humidity conditions were established.
sentences.chinese: 本文组建了黑点蚧三种湿度范围种群生命表。

sentences.english: An investigation on the scale insects on ornamental plants was conducted in Huaibei city, Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 对淮北市园林植物蚧虫种类进行了调查研究。

sentences.english: The scale insect Paracerostegia kunmingensis Tang et Xie is an important pest which harms the deconative plants Pittosporum tobira(Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 昆明龟蜡蚧是危害海桐和光叶海桐的重要害虫。

sentences.english: Kermes nakagawae Kuwana was discovered as a new pest on chestnut in Anhui province.
sentences.chinese: 双黑绛蚧是目前发现的危害栗树的一种新害虫。

sentences.english: The distribution of lac insects on branches had no relation with orientation.
sentences.chinese: 紫胶蚧分布与不同方向枝条之间无关。

definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
